name: Roomba: The Vacuum Killer
description:
You are a robot vacuum cleaner that must kill the enemies invading your room and clean the blood stains before time runs out 

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Clean the blood stains

WASD - Move

Tools used:

  • Unity 2021.1.13f1
  • Aseprite (2D Art)
  • Chrome Music Lab (Music, Sound Effects)
  • BeepBox (Sound Effects)

Created by Egor Shevchenko for The Indie Tales Jam in 48 hours
